original_title: Joseph and the Coat of Many Colours
overview: In this inspirational Bible story, Joseph is his father's favorite, but he is sold into slavery by his jealous brothers. Overcoming all obstacles, Joseph becomes Governor of Egypt and saves his family from famine, reuniting at last with his beloved father and forgiving his brothers.
tagline: Joseph saves his family from the famine that overtakes the land and is reunited with his beloved father.
title: Joseph and the Coat of Many Colours
